data.comment: The match is underway at McDiarmid Park.
Ball safe as Aberdeen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Aberdeen in their own half.
William Collum awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Aberdeen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in St Johnstone.
Can St Johnstone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aberdeen's half?
In the minute 4, St Johnstone to take a throw-in in Aberdeen territory.
William Collum signals a throw-in for St Johnstone, close to Aberdeen's area.
David Wotherspoon (St Johnstone) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 5, Aberdeen needs to be cautious. St Johnstone have an attacking throw-in.
Aberdeen have a goal kick.
William Collum signals a Aberdeen throw-in in St Johnstone's half.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Aberdeen close to the penalty box.
William Collum awards St Johnstone a goal kick.
Throw-in for Aberdeen in the half of St Johnstone.
In the minute 8, Niall McGinn gets his shot on target but fails to score for Aberdeen.
Aberdeen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Aberdeen to take a throw-in in St Johnstone territory.
In the minute 10, In Perth a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In Perth, Funso Ojo of Aberdeen is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Aberdeen.
In the minute 12, St Johnstone have been awarded a corner by William Collum.
William Collum signals a free kick to St Johnstone.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, William Collum signals a St Johnstone throw-in in Aberdeen's half.
Throw-in for Aberdeen at McDiarmid Park.
Aberdeen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 15, In Perth St Johnstone drive forward through Danny McNamara. His shot is on target but it's saved.
St Johnstone have been awarded a corner by William Collum.
Jamie McCart (St Johnstone) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 16, William Collum signals a free kick to Aberdeen in their own half.
Corner awarded to St Johnstone.
St Johnstone's Jamie McCart gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Aberdeen defender.
In the minute 18, Can St Johnstone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aberdeen's half?
Free kick for Aberdeen in their own half.
William Collum awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Aberdeen.
Free kick St Johnstone.
William Collum signals a free kick to Aberdeen in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Aberdeen in the half of St Johnstone.
Free kick for Aberdeen in their own half.
Free kick for St Johnstone in the half of Aberdeen.
In the minute 25, St Johnstone's Michael O`Halloran has run offside.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Perth.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Perth to check on Callum Hendry, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 27, St Johnstoneâ€™s Callum Hendry is on his feet again at McDiarmid Park.
Throw-in for Aberdeen in their own half.
Aberdeen awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for Aberdeen at McDiarmid Park.
Ball safe as Aberdeen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Aberdeen at McDiarmid Park.
In the minute 31, Aberdeen to take a throw-in in St Johnstone territory.
Ball safe as Aberdeen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Aberdeen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in St Johnstone's half?
In the minute 32, William Collum signals a Aberdeen throw-in in St Johnstone's half.
Free kick for Aberdeen in the half of St Johnstone.
In Perth a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for St Johnstone at McDiarmid Park.
William Collum signals a free kick to St Johnstone.
Aberdeen awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Aberdeen in the half of St Johnstone.
Aberdeen's Funso Ojo misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a St Johnstone goal kick.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in St Johnstone.
Free kick for St Johnstone in their own half.
In the minute 42, Aberdeen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick St Johnstone.
Throw-in for St Johnstone in the half of Aberdeen.
In the minute 44, Throw-in for Aberdeen in their own half.
William Collum awards the home team a throw-in.
The 1st half is prolonged by 1 minutes of added time.
In the minute 45, Throw-in Aberdeen.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has started.
Throw-in for St Johnstone in their own half.
In the minute 46, William Collum awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for St Johnstone at McDiarmid Park.
In the minute 46, The away team replace Ronald Hernandez with Connor McLennan.
Aberdeen make their second substitution with Matthew Kennedy replacing Dean Campbell.
Aberdeen have a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Can St Johnstone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aberdeen's half?
William Collum signals a free kick to Aberdeen in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 50, William Collum awards Aberdeen a goal kick.
St Johnstone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
St Johnstone are coming forward and Callum Hendry gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 51, Ball goes out of play for a Aberdeen goal kick.
William Collum signals a Aberdeen throw-in in St Johnstone's half.
Free kick for St Johnstone in the half of Aberdeen.
In the minute 53, Lewis Ferguson (Aberdeen) has received a first yellow card.
St Johnstone drive upfield and Callum Hendry gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Aberdeen defender.
St Johnstone push forward at McDiarmid Park and Scott Tanser gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Aberdeen defence.
In the minute 54, St Johnstone have been awarded a corner by William Collum.
Aberdeen to take a throw-in in St Johnstone territory.
Important block from the Aberdeen defence as Michael O`Halloran fires in a strike for St Johnstone.
In the minute 57, Corner awarded to St Johnstone.
William Collum signals a Aberdeen throw-in in St Johnstone's half.
Ball safe as Aberdeen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Aberdeen at McDiarmid Park.
Can Aberdeen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in St Johnstone's half?
In Perth a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Aberdeen in the half of St Johnstone.
Michael O`Halloran (St Johnstone) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, St Johnstone's Liam Craig gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Perth.
Ball safe as Aberdeen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, Aberdeen's Niall McGinn is on target but unsuccessful.
St Johnstone to take a throw-in in Aberdeen territory.
Free kick for St Johnstone in their own half.
In the minute 66, Goal kick for Aberdeen at McDiarmid Park.
Throw-in for St Johnstone in their own half.
William Collum awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 67, Free kick Aberdeen.
William Collum signals a free kick to Aberdeen.
Thomas Hoban for Aberdeen gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 69, William Collum awards St Johnstone a goal kick.
Derek McInnes is making the team's third substitution at McDiarmid Park with Craig Bryson replacing Funso Ojo.
Callum Davidson (St Johnstone) is making a first substitution, with Craig Conway replacing Callum Hendry.
In the minute 70, St Johnstone awarded a free kick in their own half.
William Collum signals a free kick to Aberdeen in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for St Johnstone in Perth.
In the minute 71, Throw-in for St Johnstone at McDiarmid Park.
Throw-in St Johnstone.
David Wotherspoon for St Johnstone is whistled offside.
In the minute 73, In Perth a free kick has been awarded the away team.
St Johnstone to take a throw-in in Aberdeen territory.
Ball goes out of play for a St Johnstone goal kick.
In the minute 76, Isaac Olaofe is on a sub for David Wotherspoon for St Johnstone.
William Collum waits before resuming play because Michael O`Halloran for St Johnstone is still down.
Throw-in for Aberdeen in the half of St Johnstone.
In the minute 77, Michael O`Halloran for St Johnstone is back on the field again.
St Johnstone have a dangerous throw-in.
St Johnstone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 80, The away team have replaced Niall McGinn with Ryan Hedges. This is the fourth substitution made today by Derek McInnes.
St Johnstone drive forward but Scott Tanser is judged offside.
William Collum signals a Aberdeen throw-in in St Johnstone's half.
In the minute 82, Can Aberdeen get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in St Johnstone's half?
Ryan Hedges scores to make it 0-1 at McDiarmid Park.
Great play from Craig Bryson to set up the goal.
Throw-in for Aberdeen at McDiarmid Park.
Ball safe as Aberdeen is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 84, Shaleum Logan is replacing Scott Wright for Aberdeen at McDiarmid Park.
In the minute 85, William Collum signals a free kick to St Johnstone.
In the minute 85, Craig Conway of St Johnstone gets in a strike, but is off target.
The home team have replaced Danny McNamara with John Robertson. This is the third substitution made today by Callum Davidson.
Shaun Rooney is replacing Liam Gordon for the home team.
Aberdeen have a goal kick.
William Collum signals a free kick to St Johnstone in their own half.
In the minute 86, Throw-in for Aberdeen in their own half.
William Collum awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for St Johnstone in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in Aberdeen.
In the minute 88, Ryan Hedges (Aberdeen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Liam Craig (St Johnstone) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for St Johnstone in the half of Aberdeen.
At McDiarmid Park, Ross McCrorie has been yellow-carded for the away team.
St Johnstone are pushing forward but Craig Conway's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Perth.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Aberdeen awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for St Johnstone in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Perth.
St Johnstone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
